name: streamvix
description: StreamViX addon con Vixsrc, Guardaserie, Altadefinizione, AnimeUnity, AnimeSaturn, AnimeWorld, Eurostreaming, TV ed Eventi Live

scripts.build: tsc && shx cp src/providers/animeunity_scraper.py dist/providers/ && shx cp src/providers/animesaturn.py dist/providers/ && shx cp src/providers/animeworld_scraper.py dist/providers/ && shx cp src/providers/eurostreaming.py dist/providers/ && shx cp -r config dist/ && shx cp vavoo_resolver.py dist/ && shx cp tvtap_resolver.py dist/
